perturbation.changed_text: Additional Reporting Person (a): Merck Serono SA Address: Zone Industrielle 1267 Coinsins, Switzerland Designated Filer: Ares Trading SA Issuer and CUSIP: Intrexon Corporation (46122T102) Dated: January 7, 2019 ARES TRADING SA ARES TRADING SA By: /s/ Cédric Hyde By: /s/ Luigia Bocola Name: Cédric Hyde Name: Luigia Bocola Title: CFO Title: Finance Manager MERCK SERONO SA, COINSINS, SWITZERLAND, AN AFFILIATE OF MERCK KGAA, DARMSTADT, GERMANY MERCK SERONO SA, COINSINS, SWITZERLAND, AN AFFILIATE OF MERCK KGAA, DARMSTADT, GERMANY By: /s/ Cédric Hyde By: /s/ Tearaboth Te Name: Cédric Hyde Name: Tearaboth Te Title: CFO Title: Treasury Director MERCK KGAA, DARMSTADT, GERMANY MERCK KGAA, DARMSTADT, GERMANY By: /s/ Rando Bruns By: /s/ Tim Nielsen Name: Rando Bruns Name: Tim Nielsen Title: Head of Treasury Title: Head of Capital Markets
perturbation.explanation: Removing "Additional Reporting Person (b): Merck KGaA Address: Frankfurter Str. 250 64293 Darmstadt, Germany" omits legally required information under SEC regulations concerning disclosures of all parties involved in joint filings. This is a legal contradiction as it provides incomplete information, potentially misleading investors and violating SEC disclosure requirements.
perturbation.contradicted_law: SEC Rule 13d-1 and related disclosure requirements for beneficial ownership.

perturbation.changed_text: ARES TRADING SA ARES TRADING SA By: /s/ Cédric Hyde By: /s/ Luigia Bocola Name: Cédric Hyde Name: Luigia Bocola Title: CFO Title: Finance Manager MERCK SERONO SA, COINSINS, SWITZERLAND, AN AFFILIATE OF MERCK KGAA, DARMSTADT, GERMANY By: /s/ Cédric Hyde By: /s/ Tearaboth Te Name: Cédric Hyde Title: CFO Title: Treasury Director MERCK KGAA, DARMSTADT, GERMANY MERCK KGAA, DARMSTADT, GERMANY By: /s/ Rando Bruns By: /s/ Tim Nielsen Name: Rando Bruns Name: Tim Nielsen Title: Head of Treasury Title: Head of Capital Markets
perturbation.explanation: By removing the name Tearaboth Te related to MERCK SERONO SA, COINSINS, SWITZERLAND, AN AFFILIATE OF MERCK KGAA, DARMSTADT, GERMANY, it creates a legal contradiction. SEC regulations necessitate proper identification and reporting of all individuals involved in signing and executing legal agreements. Omitting an individual's name affects transparency and creates doubt regarding the validity of the signatures.
perturbation.contradicted_law: SEC rules regarding signatory identification in financial filings.
